structure:Codelist.common:Name: Unit of Measurement Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of units of measurement for statistical data, including special codes for data processing.

structure:Code.common:Name: Special Processing Code
structure:Code.common:Description: Special code used for data processing and layout purposes.

structure:Code.common:Name: Number
structure:Code.common:Description: Unit of measurement for count data (persons, items, units).

structure:Code.common:Name: Area
structure:Code.common:Description: Unit of measurement for area data (square meters, hectares, square kilometers).

structure:Code.common:Name: Volume
structure:Code.common:Description: Unit of measurement for volume data (cubic meters, liters, cubic feet).
